description: Classic, plaid micro-cord style with a responsible design? Turns out you really can have the best of both worlds with the Dooley Long Sleeve for men. It’s made with 100% organic cotton goodness, for a texture that’s as soft as it is sustainable. With added double chest pockets for some storage space, and even gave them some button closures for extra security. And with a classic standard fit, the Dooley looks good with pretty much anything you can throw at it. Dress it up with chinos, keep it casual with jeans, wear it on it’s own, or layered up with a lightweight tee. The choice is yours, and the possibilities are endless.
name: Prana Dooley LS - Mens
